text: Chevreulia is a genus of plants in the sunflower family, described as a genus in 1817.Cassini, Alexandre Henri Gabriel de. 1817. Bulletin des Sciences, par la Societe Philomatique 1817: 69-70 in FrenchTropicos, Chevreulia Cass. The genus is native to South America (Brazil, Bolivia, Ecuador, Argentina) and the Falkland Islands.Flann, C (ed) 2009+ Global Compositae Checklist Cabrera, A. L. 1971. Compositae. 7: 1–451. In M.N. Correa (ed.) Flora Patagónica. title: Chevreulia
